1153311.content:
How about this ....

Dustin, Zoey's younger brother wakes up to find his older sister in his room with a smirk on her face. Dustin isn't sure why his sister was in his room, but he did feel somehow that something was off. Dustin felt a damp wet patch between his legs. Dustin, alarmed at this strange feeling looked down to examine his pyjama bottoms more thoroughly. Dustin was even more alarmed when he saw that his light blue pajama bottoms had turned a dark shade of blue. Dustin feared the worse and bent his head down, to confirm if his fears were warranted. Dustin snapped his head back when the smell hit him. He didn't did he?

Zoey approached Dustin with her cell phone in hand. Zoey came closer to Dustin, and flicked her phone open, with a quick thrust from her hand and showed Dustin the photograph she had taken.

Dustin wanted to cry at the photo he was now seeing. He saw himself with his wet pajamas on full display.

Dustin begged Zoey. "Please delete the photo, Zoey. Please, I'm begging with you, please. (Dustin started to cry) I'll - sniff - do anything. Please, j-just delete the photo."

Zoey replied in a singsong sweet voice. "Anything?"

Dustin replied loudly. "Yes, anything you want. Just delete the photograph."

Zoey said. "Well I'll delete the photo if, (Zoey pulls out a large thick contract) you sign this."

Dustin replied. "With what I don't have anything to sign it with."

Zoey replied. "With this, she pulled out a silver metal pen."

Dustin said. "Alright, I'll sign it if you delete the photo and any copies you have."

Zoey said. "Here you go." (Zoey said as she handed Dustin the contract, and pen.)

Dustin quickly signed the contract.

Zoey showed Dustin, that she deleted the photograph, and swears that she didn't have any copies.

Dustin asked. "So what did I just sign?"

Zoey answered. "You signed a law binding contract with me."

Dustin asked again. "So what does the contract do?"

Zoey again answered. "Alright guess I should explain the contract. But it's going to take some time, so feel free to change your bed and clothes."

Dustin replied nervously. "Oh right."

Dustin made quick work of stripping his bed, and replacing the sheets. Then he changed out his pajamas, while Zoey looked away.

Dustin said. "Alright you can look back now Zoey."

Zoey looked backed towards Dustin.

Dustin asked. "So you said you would explain the contract, and what it does?"

Zoey replied. "Oh, right."

Zoey cleared her throat and started to explain the contract.

Zoey started with the legal mumbo jumbo.

Meanwhile, Dustin tuned it out.

Then Zoey got to the bulk of the contract, the part where it details what the contract is, and what it does.

Dustin hearing that Zoey had finished with the legal mumbo jumbo, tuned back in.

Zoey said. "The person who signs this contract, acknowledges that he/she has given up all their human rights. Furthermore, he/she also acknowledges that they have given themselves over to the other party, who now have full control over them. This other party will dress, feed, bathe, the individual that has signed this contract. In other words the person who has signed this contract has given themselves over to the other party, who now have full control over them. If this individual fails to comply with the person they have signed this contract with, they will be put in jail under the official act of "compliance and subjugation". With the strictest sentence available. Even death, or life imprisonment. The person that they signed this contract to, has full control with how to deal with discompliance."

Zoey added. "So basically I now have full control over you. If you do not obey, then I will have to punish you."

Zoey asked. "So any questions?"

Dustin asked. "Wait, what official act of "compliance and subjugation" are you talking about?

Zoey sighed, then answered. "I guess you haven't been paying attention to the news lately. Well the act came out earlier this year, with the full authority of the government to back it."

Dustin then asked. "So what now?"
1153311.title: (Bedwetting) - The agreement

When Zoey was finished, Dustin was crying and his but glowed a dark shade of red.

Dustin just meekly nodded his head.

info.description:
Since the other Zoey 101 Diaperstory, here didn't turned out too well, I decided to create my own.

To avoid the same fate as the other Zoey 101 Diaperstory, I lay down the following rules.

1. Please make sure that your chapter is at least one paragraph long, unless it's one for the first chapter's where you decide who is diapered for what reason.

2. I am not very kneen on age regression or age progression, neither mentally nor physically. Therefore I don't want you to mix AR or AP storylines with normal ones. So there is one area for Stories with AR or AP, and one for normal stories without AR and AP.
